languages.text: If a hive world character has {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}melee superiority{/g} against the enemy, the effect is increased by +10. If an enemy has {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} superiority against a hive world character, the effect is decreased by −10. Melee Superiority: in melee combat, any target surrounded by more allies than enemies receives a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for each additional ally. Larger creatures need to be surrounded by more than two enemies to provide this advantage to the attackers.
languages.original_text: Когда персонаж с мира-улья получает {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}превосходство в ближнем бою{/g}, этот эффект усиливается на 10. Когда противник получает превосходство в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} против персонажа с мира-улья, эффект ослабевает на 10. Превосходство в ближнем бою: когда рядом с целью больше союзников, чем противников, цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус+10{/g} к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} за каждого союзника. Для получения превосходства при атаке крупного существа нужно, чтобы его окружило более 2 противников.

traits.locale_text: If a Hive world character has melee superiority against the enemy, the effect is increased by +10. If an enemy has a melee superiority against a hive world character, the effect is decreased by −10. Melee Superiority: In melee combat any target surrounded by more allies then enemies receives a +10 WS bonus for each additional ally. Larger creatures need to be surrounded by more than two enemies to provide this advantage to the attackers.

If a hive world character has {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}melee superiority{/g} against the enemy, the effect is increased by +10. If an enemy has {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} superiority against a hive world character, the effect is decreased by −10. Melee Superiority: in melee combat, any target surrounded by more allies than enemies receives a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for each additional ally. Larger creatures need to be surrounded by more than two enemies to provide this advantage to the attackers.

If a hive world character has {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}melee superiority{/g} against the enemy, the effect is increased by +10. If an enemy has {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} superiority against a hive world character, the effect is decreased by −10. Melee Superiority: in melee combat, any target surrounded by more allies than enemies receives a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for each additional ally. Larger creatures need to be surrounded by more than two enemies to provide this advantage to the attackers.

languages.text: Wenn ein Makropolwelt-Charakter {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}Nahkampfüberlegenheit{/g} gegen den Feind hat, wird der Effekt um +10 erhöht. Wenn ein Feind {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampf{/g}-Überlegenheit gegen einen Makropolwelt-Charakter hat, wird der Effekt um −10 verringert. Nahkampfüberlegenheit: Im Nahkampf erhält jedes Ziel, das von mehr Verbündeten als Feinden umgeben ist, für jeden zusätzlichen Verbündeten einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +10 auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g}. Größere Kreaturen müssen von mehr als zwei Feinden umgeben sein, damit die Angreifer diesen Vorteil erhalten.
languages.original_text: If a hive world character has {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}melee superiority{/g} against the enemy, the effect is increased by +10. If an enemy has {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} superiority against a hive world character, the effect is decreased by −10. Melee Superiority: in melee combat, any target surrounded by more allies than enemies receives a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for each additional ally. Larger creatures need to be surrounded by more than two enemies to provide this advantage to the attackers.

traits.locale_text: Wenn ein Makropolwelt-Charakter {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}Nahkampfüberlegenheit{/g} gegen den Gegner hat, wird der Effekt um +10 erhöht. Wenn ein Gegner Nahkampfüberlegenheit gegen einen Makropolwelt-Charakter hat, wird der Effekt um −10 verringert. Nahkampfüberlegenheit: Im Nahkampf erhält jedes Ziel, das von mehr Verbündeten als Gegnern umgeben ist, einen +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WF-{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} für jeden zusätzlichen Verbündeten. Größere Kreaturen müssen von mehr als zwei Gegnern umgeben sein, damit die Angreifer diesen Vorteil erhalten.

languages.text: Si un personnage issu d'un monde ruche bénéficie de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}Supériorité en mêlée{/g} contre l'ennemi, l'effet augmente de +10. Si un ennemi bénéficie de Supériorité en {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} contre un personnage issu d'un monde ruche, l'effet diminue de −10. Supériorité en mêlée : lors d'un combat de mêlée, toute cible entourée de plus d'alliés que d'ennemis reçoit un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'arme{/g} de +10 pour chaque allié supplémentaire. Les créatures de grande taille doivent être entourées de plus de deux ennemis pour offrir cet avantage aux attaquants.
languages.original_text: If a hive world character has {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}melee superiority{/g} against the enemy, the effect is increased by +10. If an enemy has {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} superiority against a hive world character, the effect is decreased by −10. Melee Superiority: in melee combat, any target surrounded by more allies than enemies receives a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for each additional ally. Larger creatures need to be surrounded by more than two enemies to provide this advantage to the attackers.

traits.locale_text: Si un personnage issu d'un monde ruche bénéficie de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}Supériorité en mêlée{/g} contre l'ennemi, l'effet augmente de +10. Si un ennemi bénéficie de Supériorité en {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} contre un personnage issu d'un monde ruche, l'effet diminue de −10. Supériorité en mêlée : lors d'un combat de mêlée, toute cible entourée de plus d'alliés que d'ennemis reçoit un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'arme{/g} de +10 pour chaque allié supplémentaire. Les créatures de grande taille doivent être entourées de plus de deux ennemis pour offrir cet avantage aux attaquants.

languages.text: 当巢都世界的角色对敌人拥有{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}近战优势{/g}时，此优势效果提高10点。当敌人对巢都世界的角色拥有{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}优势时，此优势效果降低10点。 近战优势：在近战时，若此角色身边盟友数量多于敌人数量，则每多一名盟友，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}都会提高10点。攻击大型生物时，身边盟友的数量必须比敌人至少多出两名，才能触发近战优势。
languages.original_text: If a hive world character has {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}melee superiority{/g} against the enemy, the effect is increased by +10. If an enemy has {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} superiority against a hive world character, the effect is decreased by −10. Melee Superiority: in melee combat, any target surrounded by more allies then enemies receives a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for each additional ally. Larger creatures need to be surrounded by more than two enemies to provide this advantage to the attackers.

traits.locale_text: 当巢都世界的角色对敌人拥有{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}近战优势{/g}时，此优势效果提高10点。当敌人对巢都世界的角色拥有近战优势时，此优势效果降低10点。 近战优势：在近战时，若此角色身边盟友数量多于敌人数量，则每多一名盟友，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}都会提高10点。{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}攻击大型生物时，身边盟友的数量必须比敌人至少多出两名，才能触发近战优势。

languages.text: Si un personaje de mundo colmena tiene {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}superioridad cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} contra el enemigo, el efecto aumenta en +10. Si un enemigo tiene superioridad {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} contra un personaje de mundo colmena, el efecto se reduce en −10. Superioridad cuerpo a cuerpo: En combate cuerpo a cuerpo, cualquier objetivo rodeado por más aliados que enemigos recibe una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} +10 a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} por cada aliado adicional. Para las criaturas más grandes, es necesario rodearlas con más de dos enemigos para que los atacantes reciban la bonificación.
languages.original_text: If a hive world character has {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}melee superiority{/g} against the enemy, the effect is increased by +10. If an enemy has {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} superiority against a hive world character, the effect is decreased by −10. Melee Superiority: in melee combat, any target surrounded by more allies than enemies receives a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for each additional ally. Larger creatures need to be surrounded by more than two enemies to provide this advantage to the attackers.

traits.locale_text: Si un personaje de mundo colmena tiene {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}superioridad cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} contra el enemigo, el efecto aumenta en +10. Si un enemigo tiene superioridad numérica contra un personaje de mundo colmena, el efecto se reduce en −10. Superioridad cuerpo a cuerpo: En combate cuerpo a cuerpo, cualquier objetivo rodeado por más aliados que enemigos recibe una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} +10 a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}HA{/g} por cada aliado adicional. Para las criaturas más grandes, es necesario rodearlas con más de dos enemigos para que los atacantes reciban la bonificación.

languages.text: 過密惑星が敵に対して{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}近接優位{/g}の場合、その効果が+10増加する。敵が過密惑星のキャラクターに対して{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}優勢の場合、その効果が-10減少する。 近接優位：近接戦闘において、敵よりも多くの味方に囲まれているターゲットは、味方1人につき+10の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得る。大型の生物は2体以上の敵に囲まれていないと、攻撃側がこのアドバンテージを得ることはできない。

traits.locale_text: 過密惑星が敵に対して{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}近接攻撃優勢{/g}の場合、その効果が+10増加する。敵が過密惑星のキャラクターに対して近接攻撃優勢の場合、その効果が-10減少する。 近接攻撃優勢：近接戦闘において、敵よりも多くの味方に囲まれているターゲットは、味方1人につき+10の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WS{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得る。大型の生物は2体以上の敵に囲まれていないと、攻撃側がこのアドバンテージを得ることはできない。

Когда противник получает превосходство в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} против персонажа с мира-улья, эффект ослабевает на 10. Для получения превосходства при атаке крупного существа нужно, чтобы его окружило более 2 противников.
